articles.summary: More reporting and resources about education This undated file image shows an empty classroom. In the 400-plus history of the nation, it's only been a relatively short time since the Supreme Court determined that separate schools for Black children and white children violated the Constitution and the nation's founding principles. Many decades later, the nation continues to have highly-segregated schools,...
